metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5609 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in lib/migrate.php in ownCloud before 4.5.2 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary PHP code by uploading a crafted mount.php file in a ZIP file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5609` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> owncloud packages in Ubuntu are now empty

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1').
